name: CalVet Home Loans
description: Competitive mortgage rates for California veterans; low/no down payment options; disaster protection included; farm and manufactured home loans available
fullDescription: CalVet Home Loans provides California veterans with competitive mortgage financing to purchase homes, farms, or manufactured homes. The program often offers below-market interest rates and unique benefits not available through conventional lenders.
whatTheyOffer:
- Competitive fixed interest rates
- Low or no down payment options
- Disaster protection (fire, earthquake, flood)
- Rehabilitation and home improvement loans
- Farm and manufactured home loans
- No prepayment penalties
- Sellers may assist with closing costs
howToGetIt:
1. Must be an eligible California veteran
2. Must purchase property in California
3. Apply online at CalVet Home Loans website
4. Get pre-qualified before house hunting
5. Complete application with CalVet-approved lender
6. Provide DD214, income verification, and credit check
